@param _docsLocationHash Decentralized storage location hash of the documents

nodes.documentation: @dev Add funds to the pool. Contract status needs to be 'Open', 'WaterMarkReached' or 'DueDiligence' in order to contribute additional funds
nodes.name: addFundsToPool

nodes.documentation: @dev User can withdraw funds and leave the pool at any time. There is no penalty for user withdrawing their contribution - they only pay the gas fee for the transaction
nodes.name: leavePool

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "All input values should be non 0"

arguments.value: All input values should be non 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "All input values should be non 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Sender has to be the ACA address"

arguments.value: Sender has to be the ACA address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Sender has to be the ACA address"

nodes.name: configurePool

nodes.documentation: @dev Complete the configuration and start the due diligence timer for participants to review the configured parameters - only the authorized address can do this
nodes.name: completeConfiguration

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows authorized configuration address to remove users who do not comply with KYC. A small fee is charged to the person being kicked from the pool (only enough to cover gas costs of the transaction)
@param _participantToKick Address of the person to kick from the pool.
nodes.name: kickUser

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Value sent is not correct based on the fee"

arguments.value: Value sent is not correct based on the fee

arguments.value: Call to vendor fallback function failed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Call to vendor fallback function failed"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Once the pool is 'InReview' status, the funds can be released to the Sale contract in exchange for tokens - only the authorized address can do this
NOTE: address.call is used to get around the fact that the minimum gas amount is sent with a .send() or .transfer() - this call needs more than the minimum
nodes.name: releaseFundsToSale

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Pool token balance is greater than 0"

arguments.value: Pool token balance is greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Pool token balance is greater than 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Call to vendors claim function failed"

arguments.value: Call to vendors claim function failed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Call to vendors claim function failed"

nodes.documentation: @dev If tokens are not minted by vendor at time of purchase, they need to be claimed once the sale is over - only the authorized address can do this.
nodes.name: claimTokensFromVendor

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Pool token balance is greater than 0"

arguments.value: Pool token balance is greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Pool token balance is greater than 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Call to vendors refund function failed"

arguments.value: Call to vendors refund function failed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Call to vendors refund function failed"

nodes.documentation: @dev In the case that the token sale is unsuccessful, withdraw funds from Sale Contract back to this contract in order for users to claim their funds back - only the authorized address can do this
nodes.name: claimRefundFromVendor

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by each pool participant. Tokens are distributed proportionately to how much they contributed.
nodes.name: claimTokens

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Participant has already claimed a refund"

arguments.value: Participant has already claimed a refund

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Participant has already claimed a refund"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Called by each pool participant. If there are any funds left in the contract after the sale completes, participants are entitled to claim their share proportionality to how much they contributed
NOTE: This is a 'call once' function - once refund is claimed, it cannot be called again
nodes.name: claimRefund

arguments.value: Due diligence period has not yet elapsed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Due diligence period has not yet elapsed"

nodes.documentation: @dev - Set the pool state to 'InReview'. Only allowed by authorized address
nodes.name: startInReviewPeriod

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(address,contract IErc20Token,address,bool,string storage ref,string storage ref,string storage ref,string storage ref)

nodes.name: getConfigDetails

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(enum PoolParty.Status,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,string storage ref,string storage ref,uint256,uint256,string storage ref)

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns all relevant pool details in 1 function
nodes.name: getPoolDetails

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows anyone to query the percentage contribution, refund amount and tokens due for a given address. If no tokens have been received by the sale contract, returns 0
@param _user The user address of the account to look up
nodes.name: getContributionsDue

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the pool fee to be waived
nodes.name: waiveFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function to calculate the relevant contributions for a given user
@param _user User to calculate for
nodes.name: calculateParticipationAmounts
removeUserFromList
